amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the cost of cleanup be included in financial assurance and that financial insurance instruments shall be in the form of a surety bond, letter of credit or other instrument that would routinely be accepted in commerce.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-214 to require that the cost of cleanup be included in financial assurance and that financial insurance instruments shall be in the form of a surety bond, letter of credit or other instrument that would routinely be accepted in commerce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 235 (Roll no. 469).
